AuthenticationSite.ChooseMethod: Choose your preferred method to access {resource}

hero.title: Newt (Recommended)
hero.description: For the best user experience, use Newt. It uses WireGuard under the hood and allows you to address your private resources by their LAN address on your private network from within the Pangolin dashboard.
hero.shell: Runs in shell on macOS, Linux, and Windows
hero.basicDesc: Use any WireGuard client to connect. You'll have to access your internal resources by their peer IP.

content.title: Manage Sites
content.description: Allow connectivity to your network through secure tunnels

popup.title: Create Site
popup.description: Create a new site to start connection for this site
popup.name: Name
popup.nameDesc: This is the name that will be displayed for this site.
popup.methodDesc: This is how you will expose connections.
popup.warning: You will only be able to see the configuration once.
popup.learn: Learn how to install Newt on your system

hero.title: Resources
hero.description: Resources are proxy servers for applications running in your private network. Create a resource for each HTTP or HTTPS application in your private network. Each resource must be connected to a site to allow private and secure connection through the encrypted WireGuard tunnel.

content.title: Manage Resources
content.description: Create secure proxies to your private applications

popup.title: Create Resource
popup.description: Create a new resource to proxy request to your app
popup.name: Name
popup.nameDesc: This is the name that will be displayed for this resource.
popup.subdomainDesc: This is the fully qualified domain name that will be used to access the resource.
popup.siteDesc: This is the site that will be used in the dashboard.

hero.title: Shareable Links
hero.description: Create shareable links to your resources. Links provide temporary or unlimited access to your resource. You can configure the expiration duration of the link when you create one.

content.title: Manage Shareable Links
content.description: Create shareable links to grant temporary or permanent access to your resources
content.empty: No links. Create one to get started.

createPopup.title: Create Shareable Link
createPopup.description: Anyone with this link can access the resource
createPopup.info: Expiration time is how long the link will be usable and provide access to the resource. After this time, the link will no longer work, and users who used this link will lose access to the resource.

content.title: Manage User & Roles
content.description: Invite users and add them to roles to manage access to your organization

descriptions.admin: Admin role with the most permissions

invitePopup.title: Invite User
invitePopup.description: Grant new users access to your organization

general.title: General
general.orgSettingsDescription: Manage your organization details and configuration
general.name: Name
general.nameDescription: This is the display name of the org
general.dangerDescription: Once you delete this org, there is no going back. Please be certain.
